mutants.mutated_line: subset = [element for element in arr if len(element) <= threshold]
mutants.code:
def get_subset(arr, threshold):
    arr = [element.lower() for element in arr]
    arr = list(set(arr))
    subset = [element for element in arr if len(element) <= threshold]
    subset.sort()
    return subset

def get_subset(arr, threshold):
    arr = [element.lower() for element in arr]
    arr = list(set(arr))
    subset = [element for element in arr if len(element) != threshold]
